mapper.select: SELECT EST_NO, CO_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.CO_CD) AS CO_NM, SALES_EMP_ID, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.SALES_EMP_ID) AS SALES_EMP_NM, EST_COPRT, (SELECT NAME FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE ID = T.EST_COPRT) AS EST_COPRT_NM, EST_CLNT_CD, EST_CLNT_NM, EST_RPRC, BIZ_TEL_NO, BIZ_FAX_NO, MNG_EMAIL, PRJCT_NM, EST_DT, RMK FROM TB_SD03M01 T WHERE EST_NO = #{estNo}

SELECT EST_NO, EST_PRDT_SEQ, PRDT_DIV, PRDT_STKN, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_STKN) AS PRDT_STKN_NM, PRDT_SIZE, PRDT_SPEC, PRDT_CD, (SELECT PRDT_NM FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_NM, PRDT_UNIT, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T.PRDT_UNIT) AS PRDT_UNIT_NM, (SELECT PRDT_STOCK_CD FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD) AS PRDT_STOCK_CD, EST_QTY, EST_UPR, EST_AMT, (EST_AMT - EST_QTY * STOCK_UPR) AS EXP_AMT, STOCK_UPR, RMK FROM TB_SD03D01 T WHERE T.EST_NO = #{estNo}
SELECT * FROM TB_CM08M01 WHERE FILE_TRGT_TYP = 'TB_SD03M01' AND FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey}
SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || LPAD(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(SUBSTR(EST_NO, -4))), 0) + 1, 4, 0) FROM TB_SD03M01 WHERE SUBSTR(EST_NO, 0, 6) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SD03M01 ( EST_NO, CO_CD, SALES_EMP_ID, EST_COPRT, EST_CLNT_CD, EST_CLNT_NM, EST_RPRC, BIZ_TEL_NO, BIZ_FAX_NO, MNG_EMAIL, PRJCT_NM, EST_DT, RMK, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM )VALUES( #{estNo}, #{coCd}, #{salesEmpId}, #{estCoprt}, #{estClntCd}, #{estClntNm}, #{estRprc}, #{bizTelNo}, #{bizFaxNo}, #{mngEmail}, #{prjctNm}, #{estDt}, #{rmk}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE )

SELECT TB_SD03D01_SQ01.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TB_SD03D01 ( EST_NO, EST_PRDT_SEQ, PRDT_DIV, PRDT_STKN, PRDT_SIZE, PRDT_SPEC, PRDT_CD, PRDT_UNIT, EST_QTY, EST_UPR, EST_AMT, STOCK_UPR, RMK, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM )VALUES( #{estNo}, #{estPrdtSeq}, #{prdtDiv}, #{prdtStkn}, #{prdtSize}, #{prdtSpec}, #{prdtCd}, #{prdtUnit}, #{estQty}, #{estUpr}, #{estAmt}, #{stockUpr}, #{rmk}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SD03M01 SET CO_CD = #{coCd}, SALES_EMP_ID = #{salesEmpId}, EST_COPRT = #{estCoprt}, EST_CLNT_CD = #{estClntCd}, EST_CLNT_NM = #{estClntNm}, EST_RPRC = #{estRprc}, BIZ_TEL_NO = #{bizTelNo}, BIZ_FAX_NO = #{bizFaxNo}, MNG_EMAIL = #{mngEmail}, PRJCT_NM = #{prjctNm}, EST_DT = #{estDt}, RMK = #{rmk}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE EST_NO = #{estNo}
